features.name: DamageImmunities
features.description: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

features.name: ConditionImmunities
features.description: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

features.name: Languages
features.description: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

features.name: Immutable Form
features.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

features.name: Magic Resistance
features.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

features.name: Magic Weapons
features.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 ft. of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
